actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain State and local real property taxes paid by a financial institution on behalf of a mortgagor shall be treated as paid on December 31.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat as paid by December 31 of the calendar year any amounts paid by a taxpayer to a financial institution in connection with a mortgage loan for payment of State or local real property taxes if such taxes are paid by the financial institution within 45 days after the close of the calendar year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain State and local real property taxes paid by a financial institution on behalf of a mortgagor shall be treated as paid on December 31.
